Content.Name: Social Media
Content.Title: Social Media

xPower.Name: SEOGroup
xPower.label: SEO Group
xPower.MetaDescription: Stay connected with Recreational Sports Social Media pages. Try out our Twitter, Facebook, IMLeagues, and Youtube channel to stay connected and up to date with all the social trends in BYU-Idaho recreational sports.

Content.BodyCopy:
Connect with Rec Sports through our social media accounts. Rec Sports will be utilizing these accounts to provide the most up to date information about upcoming deadlines, schedules, rain outs, and to upload pictures.

Facebook: Like "BYU-Idaho RecSports Activities" on Facebook! The Facebook page will have all the pictures of the latest intramural action, as well as pictures of all Rec Sports champions! Participate in our contests and you could win.

 

Twitter: Follow us on Twitter and receive updates on Rec Sports! We will be tweeting fun facts for the week as well as other useful information. Check us out @BYUI_RecSports.

 

imleagues: Sign up for games by using imleagues. Keep track of all your game stats {wins, losses, and ties including your trophys}. Get email and text alerts of your game times, cancellations, reschedules, and other information that you don't want to miss.

 

YouTube: Our YouTube page will help you with some tutorials on how to sign up for leagues and inform you on Rec Sports rules and proceedures.  All of Activities shares the YouTube page so have some fun browsing videos and seeing what all of Activities are up to in general.
